review.comment: I must say this was by far one of the best experiences we've had for our grandson! He enjoy every moment! The staff was awesome! I cannot wait to book you all again! Thank you so much for making this an unforgettable day!! Blessings to you

review.comment: The Gotta Go Gaming team was awesome, this is by far thee coolest group of people I’ve ever met and we had a great time playing the different games oh and Laser Tag was so much fun!  We look forward to booking  in the future. Fun Fun and more Fun!

review.comment: As the community resource director for the Hudson Partnership I’ve contracted Gotta Go Gaming for over a dozen events over the last few years.  Their team is and has always been on point. The customer service is great, interaction with kids is always fun and they always work with you to make sure the set up is perfect. They also have a wonderful approach to giving back to the community.  They team up and support non profits and schools whenever possible. It’s an extra plus to work with a company that gives back!
review.review_reply: Hello Steven, thank you for the kind words! We're thrilled to hear how much you and your organization enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to see you again at Gotta Go Gaming.

review.comment: This was a last minute birthday party for my son Joshua who turned 14. In the middle of Covid last year. Gotta Go Gaming made my life so much easier. The only thing was the time went by so quickly so the next time we rent earlier that way we can request longer gaming time.
review.review_reply: We hope to see you again soon at Gotta Go Gaming. Until then, take care!

Will be ordering this again for my 2nd sons 10th bday

review.comment: Ok so we called gotta go gaming and set up a day with laser tag and a game truck unfortunately it rained the day of my son’s birthday party and we were unable to do the laser tag outside so my neighbor offered me to use her funeral home for the laser tag party so I had to call gotta go and informed them of the request of it being indoor in a funeral home and they were very excited to do it my son and all his friends had a blast at this his party and all his friends still talk about it till this day thank you very much gotta go gaming for making my son’s birthday party the best party for his friends and family I will 100% recommend you to anyone who ask
review.review_reply: This laser tag party was soooo fun. Thank you Peter for your 5-star review and letting us have a great time at your son's party. We look forward to the next one  )

review.comment: Gotta Go Gaming made my son’s party a time to remember! John was very responsive and accommodating. We had initially planned to have our son’s party in 2020 (but…. Covid 😒). They understood, issued a refund and were more than happy when we reached out in 2021. They showed up on time, masked up, and hosted a party for my son that he and his cousins will never forget! Thanks so much guys!

review.comment: After searching online I found this gaming truck business which was perfect for my twins' birthday party with many parents concerned about COVID exposure. We were able to hold the party outdoors and the kids had a blast playing games inside the game trailer. Gotta Go Gaming was punctual on their appointment and had everything ready to go within minutes of arriving. My one warning for people booking Gotta Go Gaming is they do bring their own generator for the trailer (which probably all similar businesses would do) so it can be noisy but that's a small inconvenience.
review.review_reply: We appreciate the lovely feedback of Gotta Go Gaming. Thank you and have a great day!

review.comment: One of the best gaming experiences ever!  Games, options, professionalism and love for the product are all top notch and second to none.  Very easy online form to fill out based on your needs and coaches ensure kids get the full experience!  I would recommend Gotta Go Gaming to anyone looking for some fun entertainment for any event.

They had everything I would love to have them again! Their team is awesome they're very helpful and informative! 10/10 Would definitely order again!

review.comment: Gotta Go Gaming brings video game and laser tag excellence to your event. They have a wonderful team that is committed to seeing smiles on everyone's face. The inside of the mobile gaming theater has temperature control, laser lights, leather seating, and the latest gaming consoles: Xbox, PlayStation, and Nintendo Switch. Laser Tag is just as fun! It's non-stop action with the use of high tech laser taggers. Book 'em! You won't be disappointed!
review.review_reply: Thank you for your five star review. The Gotta Go Gaming team is delighted we could serve you so well.

review.comment: Gotta Go Gaming is THE best company around for video games and laser tag. They have everything gamers would want: virtual reality, Fortnite, Online Gaming, Call of Duty, Halo - you name it. They hire gamers to work there which means you will get a game trailer load of experienced customer service personnel. Laser tag is extremely fun with their laser tag guns and camouflage tents. They really bring the party to the party.
review.review_reply: We're happy to hear you had an awesome time with us at Gotta Go Gaming! Thanks for sharing your experience. We hope you stop by and see us again soon.

review.comment:
We researched every video game truck in the area for my son's birthday party, and Gotta Go Gaming was the highest rated by FAR! 5 stars with nearly 50 reviews.

The truck arrived early to set up, looked fantastic, and Will and his crew couldn't have been nicer or more helpful. The truck was amazing - air conditioned, clean, and stocked with 2 screens on the outside and 4 screens on the inside, as well as an old-school arcade console with 3000+ games. The Gotta Go Gaming team set everything up for the kids and were constantly helping the kids play games for the entire booking - pleasant the whole time. The kids had a BLAST.

As an added bonus, Gotta Go Gaming is very active in their community, which goes to show the effort and service that they extend to all.

We would absolutely book or recommend Gotta Go Gaming without hesitation in the future.
review.review_reply: We greatly appreciate your kind feedback of Gotta Go Gaming and thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. Please do not hesitate to visit us again soon! Have a great day and thanks again.

review.comment: This is a great company, the staff was excellent and everyone enjoyed themselves. Easy to get in contact with  and they are very flexible :)
